price: DEle é o que há nos céus e o que há na terra e o que há entre ambos e o que há sob o solo.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحۡتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wamā baynahumā wamā taḥta al-tharā
